Huanggang prefecture-level city in Hubei

sentences.english: Fourth, rural families in Huanggang City have very limited capacity to pay for higher education.
sentences.chinese: 第四，黃岡市農村家庭高等教育支付能力十分有限。

sentences.english: I have come to Huanggang for the first time.
Huanggang Hangzhou school campus recruitment of truth in Hangzhou set a trap?
sentences.chinese: 黃岡網校杭州分校招生真相在杭州設下陷阱？

sentences.english: I'm a third year student in Huanggang Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 我是黃岡師範學院一名大三的學生。

sentences.english: When will you arrive at Huanggang?
sentences.chinese: 你們將會什麼時候到達黃岡？

sentences.english: "Vp -neg" is a type of special interrogative pattern with a high frequency of usage in HuangGang dialect.
sentences.chinese: 是黃岡方言使用頻率較高的一種特殊問句類型。
